Group (1992-1996):
Seo Taiji and Boys

Introduction

Lee Juno is a South Korean business executive, record producer former professor, and former singer. He is best known as a member of the legendary trio Seo Taiji and The Boys. After the trio disbanded in 1996, Lee Juno focused in business endeavors and producing music.

In 2017, Lee Juno was sentenced to 1 year in prison for fraud and indecent assault.
